titleStmt.title: A paraphrase and annotations upon the books of the Psalms, briefly explaining the difficulties thereof, by H. Hammond D.D.
titleStmt.author: Hammond, Henry, 1605-1660.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by R. Norton, for Richard Davis bookseller in Oxford,

notesStmt.note: Includes index and final page of advertisment.
Reproduction of the original at the Christ Church Library, Oxford.
